alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 1:06AM CST until January 01 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN PERRY...SOUTHWESTERN CONWAY...CENTRAL YELL AND SOUTH CENTRAL POPE COUNTIES... At 106 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ola, or 13 miles east of Danville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atkins... Ola... Adona... Petit Jean State Park... Carden Bottoms... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Casa... Aplin... Birta... Ada... Carter Cove Park... Lakeview in Yell County... Nimrod... Holla Bend... Mt George... Pontoon... Kingston... Centerville... This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
